summary: Infeasible due to precedence chain (contain->eradicate->recover) and a too-tight LFT on recover_host, which also blocks segment_reconnect via precedence.

conflictSet.notes: recover_host cannot start before eradicate_host finishes.
Even with earliest possible start (after eradication), finish exceeds LFT.
segment_reconnect gated on completion of recovery.
Reconnect deadline becomes impossible once recovery shifts later.

rankedRepairs.description: Widen non-mission-critical LFT bounds to match the minimum feasible completion implied by precedence and durations.
rankedRepairs.missionImpact: Low/medium: mission-data restoration is delayed but required services availability guarantees remain unchanged.
